reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed July 2012, traveled with family
reviews.text: We cannot praise this B&B highly enough, other than to say it is more like staying with your favourite aunt who cannot do enough for you. Joan was the perfect host, and prepared delicious breakfasts for us of which there was never a morsel left over - not that it was too little, just delicious and too good to leave.
reviews.title: Great house, great location, perfect hostess

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed June 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The rooms were all of a good size, very comfortable and clean with really nice views. The location is great as it is very peaceful and away from the busy centre. Having bikes and kayaks available meant the children could amuse themselves.
reviews.title: Better than home!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed May 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Most highly recommended.
reviews.title: Perfect Place and Perfect Weekend!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed April 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: My husband surprised me with a weekend getaway to St. Michaels and I couldn't have imagined a more perfect place to stay. Joan is AMAZING, she is so welcoming and truly makes you feel at home. Everything is in perfect clean condition. The views are breathtaking and the location is perfect. We took the bikes for a ride into town to walk around and the ride over was so peaceful. We also took the kayaks out on the water for a few hours - they were so much fun! The breakfast was the best we've ever had and we can't go back. If you are thinking about making a reservation, don't wait - you won't regret staying here!
reviews.title: Great place!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed November 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Point Breeze B&B is a great place to stay. The location and property are fantastic but what truly makes it special is the very kind hostess....Joan. She makes you feel very welcome, she knows a lot about the area which she is more than happy to share so you can make the most of your trip, she cooks very nice breakfast and she is fun to talk to! Would recommend this place to anyone considering a stay in the St. Michaels area.
reviews.title: Perfect Weekend Getaway!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed June 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We went on a getaway on our way to a wedding and picked a great spot to stay. Joan was a wonderful hostess. The location was quite and beautiful. Breakfasts were worth looking forward to, everyone was different and wonderful (my wife is not normally a breakfast eater but she was there). Joan give us good advice (when asked) on what to do while we were there and what restaurants we might want to try. While in St Michaels be sure visit the Eastern Shore micro brewery, you won't be disappointed.
reviews.title: Great visit

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed November 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: ...thanks to Joan! Point Breeze B&B is a relaxing, beautifully decorated, well maintained home. We felt welcomed from the moment we stepped onto the property. Joan is so friendly and her breakfast is delicious! I have never had German pancakes before and now I am hooked. St. Michaels is already a beautiful place to stay and Joan's home just made it better. We can't wait to come back in the summer!
reviews.title: What a perfect weekend...

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed November 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: I have never felt more welcome at any Bed and Breakfast where I've ever stayed. Joan is the most friendly and accomodating hostess and a wonderful cook to boot! She is knowlegable of the area and helpful with making selections for restaurants and activities. Her home is IMMCACULATE and has everyhing you need for a warm and comfortable stay in St. Michaels. The B and B is one mile from the center of the "action" in town and is a pleasant and flat walk or bike ride (bikes provided) if you don't want to search for a parking space. Where could you stay in a home with water on THREE SIDES??? Every window has a water view and is spectacular. We enjoyed sitting at the end of the dock or at a waterside picnic table for our "happy hour" each day and making friends and partying in the evening in town. Make this place a MUST-DO!!
reviews.title: Point Breeze is the BEST!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed September 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Now if only this were our home! This place is sprawling! The neighborhood is gorgeous. I was excited to be welcomed by the tree lined road. Joan really has a gift for this. She is warm, friendly and just plain charming. She really helped educate us about the subtle nuances of the town.
reviews.title: Just like home

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed August 2011, traveled with friends
reviews.text: She had plenty of bikes, kayaks and all sorts of activities. Well prepared :). I wish we could have taken advantage of more! We were able to enjoy an afternoon biking around town. The wet bar area was really a nice touch. We quickly stuffed our wine in the wine cooler. Honestly, I think we enjoyed chatting with Joan and the other guests the most.
reviews.title: This is a nice relaxing place!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed September 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We stayed at Point Breeze the 9/21 and 9/22 for a weekend getaway. We could not be more pleased with our pick.
reviews.title: What a find

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed August 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Joan is a wonderful hostess and her home is beautiful. It is away from the hustle and bustle of downtown St. Michaels but so close to everything.
reviews.title: "A blessing of a trip!"

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed August 2012, traveled with family
reviews.text: We very much enjoyed the wonderful breakfast and the peaceful, quiet weekend. Joan knows the area well and was very helpful for dinner reservations and where to go and what to see. We had a blast riding the bikes aorund town.
reviews.title: Can You Get Any Better Than This? No!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed August 2012, traveled with family
reviews.text: It was a perfect place for our weekend getaway.
reviews.title: Perfect mother/daughter get away!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed July 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.title: A jewel of a find!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed May 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Point Breeze was the perfect getaway for the 3-day Memorial Day weekend, and every aspect of our stay exceeded our expectations. Joan's hospitality turned an already top-notch B&B-- complete with beautiful sunset views, private lounging areas, and beach cruiser bicycles-- into an unforgettable experience. Breakfast with the other couples (and Joan) was a lot of fun, not to mention the food was the best we had on the whole trip. When we shared with her a not-so-great dining experience at a new place in town, Joan was genuinely sorry for our troubles, and was grateful for our input, that she would lovingly pass on to future guests. It is quite obvious that Joan cares so much about every one of her guests, and it is no wonder that she has grown a faithful following.
reviews.title: We are glad we found Joan and Point Breeze.

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed June 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: This B&B has a very family feel to it. The grounds are very nice and the neighborhood is great for walking. We very much enjoyed our stay.
reviews.title: Joan's the greatest

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed July 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Brad and Rebecca
reviews.title: Great, homey spot on the water

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed July 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We loved being in this family home close to downtown St. Michaels but tucked away in a quiet neighborhood. We enjoyed sitting on the dock, kayaking around the harbor, biking along the neighborhood streets, and reading on the screened porch. The setting of the house was perfect with much water-front property but a little distance from the traffic of the main harbor. Joan fixed simple, delicious breakfasts, usually starting with fruit followed by a warm dish (we had omelettes one day, and German pancakes the next). Joan had great area recommendations, and we enjoyed getting to know her and a bit of the history of the house.
reviews.title: 5 out of 5 STARS!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed April 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: My wife and I chose Point Breeze for our Anniversary and I must say, it was PERFECT! Presentation was amazing and we felt right at home. We also liked that Point Breeze was on an end lot and on the other side of St. Michaels harbor (away from all of the shops and restaurants) but was close enough to it all! We had an excellent view and the pier was perfect to just relax and enjoy the sights and sounds. Breakfast was first class and we were treated like royalty! I would highly recommend this to all and we are already looking forward to another stay!
reviews.title: A piece of heaven on the Chesapeake!
